com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.schema

Enum SchemaAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SchemaAction>
      • com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.schema.SchemaAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<SchemaAction>

    public enum SchemaAction
extends Enum<SchemaAction>
    Update actions to be executed through TitanManagement in TitanManagement.updateIndex(TitanIndex, SchemaAction).
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DISABLE_INDEX
      Disables the index in the graph so that it is no longer used.
      ENABLE_INDEX
      Enables the index so that it can be used by the query processing engine.
      REGISTER_INDEX
      Registers the index with all instances in the graph cluster.
      REINDEX
      Re-builds the index from the graph
      REMOVE_INDEX
      Removes the index from the graph (optional operation)

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • REGISTER_INDEX

        public static final SchemaAction REGISTER_INDEX
        Registers the index with all instances in the graph cluster. After an index is installed, it must be registered with all graph instances.

      • REINDEX

        public static final SchemaAction REINDEX
        Re-builds the index from the graph

      • ENABLE_INDEX

        public static final SchemaAction ENABLE_INDEX
        Enables the index so that it can be used by the query processing engine. An index must be registered before it can be enabled.

      • DISABLE_INDEX

        public static final SchemaAction DISABLE_INDEX
        Disables the index in the graph so that it is no longer used.

      • REMOVE_INDEX

        public static final SchemaAction REMOVE_INDEX
        Removes the index from the graph (optional operation)

    System.out.println(c);

        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
